sentences.sentence: In 1991, Dudley went to Smeltings, his father's old school.
sentences.translation: 在1991年，达力进入了斯梅廷学校——他父亲的母校。

sentences.sentence: "Nonsense, Petunia, I never went hungry when I was at Smeltings," said Uncle Vernon heartily. "Dudley gets enough, don't you, son?"
sentences.translation: “瞎说八道，佩妮，我在斯麦尔汀学校没挨过饿，“弗农姨父实话实说。””达力吃得不少啦，对吧，儿子？
